title: X1 Pipeline - 90 Second Investor Test
description:
Get your FREE Pitch Deck Score and Investor Summary. 
The X1 Pipeline 90 Second Investor Test uses AI to create an ideal investor persona for your startup. It reviews your pitch deck and website, leveraging industry insights to deliver a tailored report within 24 hours. The best way to determine how investors see your company when you send them a pitch deck.  Your score and summary report are always FREE.
For only $20, get a premium report with tangible insights on how to improve your score.
